ValidationRule.description: If yes is selected on "Is this an Online RFP?" then several fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL ( Is_this_an_Online_RFP__c , "Yes"), (ISBLANK ( Online_RFP_Password__c )), (ISBLANK ( Online_RFP_URL__c )), (ISBLANK ( Online_RFP_Login_User_Name__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out Online RFP Login/User name, Password, and URL
